references.paper_title: 3d semantic parsing of large-scale indoor spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the S3DIS dataset, a benchmark frequently used in point cloud semantic segmentation research, which is used for evaluation in this paper.

references.paper_title: Scannet: Richly-annotated 3d reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces the ScanNetV2 dataset, another frequently used benchmark in point cloud semantic segmentation research, also used for evaluation in this paper.

references.paper_title: Semantickitti: A dataset for semantic scene understanding of lidar sequences
references.reason: This paper introduces the SemanticKITTI dataset, yet another important benchmark for point cloud semantic segmentation, providing diverse outdoor scenes used for evaluation in this work.

references.paper_title: Deep clustering for unsupervised learning of visual features
references.reason: This work is foundational to the concept of using feature clustering for unsupervised and weakly supervised learning, a core concept of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Clustering on the unit hypersphere using von mises-fisher distributions
references.reason: This paper introduces the von Mises-Fisher distribution, which is central to the proposed method's approach to modeling and aligning feature distributions.
